刑務所暴動: (けいむしょぼうどう) - prison riot
刑法: (けいほう) - criminal law; penal code
刑泥: (ケイドロ) - (abbr. of 警察と泥棒 or 刑事と泥棒) cops and robbers (hide-and-seek game)
刑罰: (けいばつ) - judgement; judgment; penalty; punishment
刑罰化: (けいばつか) - adding a penalty to a crime (e.g. fines, prison); penalizing a crime
刑部省: (うたえのつかさ) - (ぎょうぶしょう only) Ministry of Justice (1869-1871 CE); Ministry of Justice (under the ritsuryo system)
划竜: (ペーロン) - dragon boat (long 22-person canoe used for racing) (chi:); races with such boats
刖: (げつ) - Amputação dos pés como forma de punição
列: (retsu) - linha, fileira, fila, coluna, fila de espera, posto, procissão; companhia (de alguém), grupo, patentes; sequência; indicador de filas
列する: (れっする) - to line up with/to be a member of/to rank with; to attend/to take part in
列なる: (つらなる) - to extend/to stretch out/to stand in a row; to attend/to participate in; to enrol/to join
列ねる: (つらねる) - to line up/to put in a row; to add (to a group)/to accept (as a member of an organization, etc.)/to join (e.g. a list); to link/to put together/to string together (e.g. compliments)/to enumerate; to take along with/to bring with
列ぶ: (ならぶ) - to line up/to stand in a line; to rival/to match/to equal
列をなす: (れつをなす) - to form a line; to queue up; to line up
列を作る: (れつをつくる) - to form a line (row)
列を成す: (れつをなす) - to form a line; to queue up; to line up
列島: (れっとう) - archipelago; chain of islands
列強: (れっきょう) - major powers of the world; great powers
列挙分類体系: (れっきょぶんるいたいけい) - enumerative classification system
列方行奇偶検査: (れつほうこうきぐうけんさ) - transverse parity check
列火: (れっか) - (灬) kanji "fire" radical at bottom (radical 86)
列王記上: (れつおうきじょう) - Kings I (book of the Bible)
列王記下: (れつおうきか) - Kings II (book of the Bible)
列聖: (れっせい) - canonization (i.e. establishment of sainthood)
初々しい: (ういういしい) - innocent; artless; unsophisticated; fresh
初の成功: (はつのせいこう) - the first success
初め: (ぞめ) - (after the -masu stem of a verb) first doing of ... (ever, in one's life, in the new year, etc.)
初めて: (hajimete) - pela primeira vez; somente depois de ... é que ..., somente quando ... você ...
初めとする: (はじめとする) - comencing with; including
初めに: (はじめに) - first/firstly/first of all/to begin with/in the beginning/at the beginning; (as section heading of a book, etc.) Introduction/Preface
初めは: (はじめは) - at first; in the beginning; originally
初めまして: (はじめまして) - How do you do?; I am glad to meet you
初エッチ: (はつエッチ) - losing one's virginity; first-time sex
初七日: (しょなぬか) - memorial service held on the seventh day following a person's death
初乗り: (はつのり) - first ride (in a new vehicle, in the new year, etc.); base-fare zone/starting fare/base fare
初乗り料金: (はつのりりょうきん) - base fare for a bus or train or taxi
初乳: (しょにゅう) - colostrum; foremilk; first milk
初事: (ういごと) - for the first time/first thing/doing something for the first time; first menstruation
初会: (しょかい) - meeting for the first time; first meeting
初体験: (しょたいけん) - first experience (of any activity); first sexual experience
初値: (はつね) - first quotation for a stock at the first exchange meeting of the New Year; initial share price during a public offering
初優勝: (はつゆうしょう) - first championship win (esp. sumo)
初公開: (はつこうかい) - debut; opening; first public exhibition
初冠: (しょかん) - crowning a boy for the first time at a coming-of-age ceremony; (ういかんむり only)  noh cap with a rolled or drooping tail (indicative of nobility)
初冠雪: (はつかんせつ) - first snow to settle on a mountain
初冬: (はつふゆ) - early winter; tenth month of the lunar calendar
初凪: (はつなぎ) - first lull of the year; lull on New Year's Day
初初しい: (ういういしい) - innocent; artless; unsophisticated; fresh
初動: (しょどう) - initial response (e.g. to a crisis)/action in the earliest stages; initial shock (e.g. of earthquake)/preliminary tremor
初動対処: (しょどうたいしょ) - initial response
初動対応: (しょどうたいおう) - initial response
